thread.title: BRIEF-Shah Capital Management Reports Open Market Purchase Of 300,000 Shares Of Vitamin Shoppe's Common Stock On Feb 5

title: BRIEF-Shah Capital Management Reports Open Market Purchase Of 300,000 Shares Of Vitamin Shoppe's Common Stock On Feb 5

organizations.name: vitamin shoppe's common stock on feb

text:
#Market News February 6, 2018 / 6:44 PM / in 14 minutes BRIEF-Shah Capital Management Reports Open Market Purchase Of 300,000 Shares Of Vitamin Shoppe's Common Stock On Feb 5 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Shah Capital Management : 
* SHAH CAPITAL MANAGEMENT REPORTS OPEN MARKET PURCHASE OF 300,000 SHARES OF VITAMIN SHOPPE INC'S COMMON STOCK ON FEB 5 AT $3.83PER SHARE - SEC FILING ‍​ Source text : [ bit.ly/2nIpiVZ ] Further company coverage:
